text: Reagan didn't say that in a press conference. There's a time for @ POTUS to be combative but that's not during a press conference. When he was being tough with Kim Jong-un ("fire and fury"), it wasn't in the press conference. Same with Theresa May. Trust Trump ("but verify").

Donald Trump is the problem. He starts a fight with Kim Jong-un (“fire and fury”) and bring us all to the brink of global nuclear war. Then, a few months later, he flies over to the enemy’s country, becomes best pals with Kim Jong-un, and expects us to thank him. # TrumpResignpic.twitter.com/okE47ZC8ji
Cartoons: Donald Trump goes 'fire and fury' on Kim Jong-Un https://www.mercurynews.com/2017/08/12/cartoons-donald-trump-goes-fire-and-fury-on-kim-jong-un/ …

Kim Jong-Un hasn’t changed his tactics since he’s been in power. He’s bad You’re the one that provigated war with him, Mr. “Fire and Fury!” Then you have a FAKE summit? Now you act like you saved the world! Psst...I don’t think so. Before 6 mos. this will bite you in you’re ass!
No - it was when you started to call Kim Jong-un for Rocket-man and talk about fire and fury the world feared there was going to be a war with North Korea. Had nothing to do with mr Obama.
Oh, really, # SlimyDon? I think it was when you took office and started trading insults with Kim Jong-un and thretening him with "fire and fury." It was YOU the world was terrified of.
Fire and Fury President Trump by his strength and leadership offers to Kim Jong-un a peace deal that will benefit North Korea as well as the world.

Fire and Fury President Trump has extended the olive branch to Kim Jong-un . May North Korea accept this deal knowing full well that President Trump will hold him accountable and not be trying to deceive President Trump like Kim has done to past leaders.
